Name: Unbeaten Hero
Desc: A vivacious succulent that can be found in the Stadium of the Sacred Flame, said to be one of the most popular potted plants in all of Natlan.\nThis plant is known for its immense vitality, as well as its thick, full leaves that are capable of storing large amounts of moisture and nutrients, allowing it to survive even in the most extreme conditions. Hence the name, "Unbeaten Hero."
Source: Learned from Realm Depot Furnishing Blueprint
